授業目的: This course introduces students to the basic study skills necessary for an undergraduate.
到達目標: After taking this course, students will have learned the basic skills necessary for an undergraduate.
授業方法: Seminar: presentation, discussion, background lectures. Zoom lessons for students who have received permission to study online.

トピック.授業計画1: Each class will consists of student presentations, in-class discussion, and a small explanatory lecture by the instructure.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to finish the assigned weekly reading and complete a short report on the reading for sharing in class.
